Uses of Package
suncertify.db

Packages that use suncertify.db
suncertify.db The database package provides the data access object (DAO) functionality. 
 

Classes in suncertify.db used by suncertify.db
Data
          The data access class that implements the required public database interface DBAccess via its extension, DBSearchFriendlyAccess.
DatabaseFileException
          A checked exception with which an abnormal condition in the database file access class DBFileAccess is signaled.
DBAccess
          The Sun-provided database access interface to be implemented by the data access class Data.
DBFileAccess
          Sole access point to the database file.
DBSearchFriendlyAccess
          An extension of the supplied database access interface DBAccess that permits concise searches and remedies minor method-naming inconsistencies of the original database access interface.
DuplicateKeyException
          A checked exception which is thrown when an attempt is made to insert a record into the database whose primary key is identical to the primary key of an existing record.
RecordMetaData
          Enables to collect and verify and provides the record meta data (also referred to as schema description) for a database record, as specified in the header section of the database file.
RecordNotFoundException
          A checked exception that is thrown when a record as given by its record number is not found as a valid record in the database.
